Articles.Content: I was thinking if anyone would like to see some of the new Mk1 parts as 2.5m aircraft parts so we can make research jets, of course not many parts would look good there but some more parts could be made to flush it out. What do you think?

Not really you'd need a set of 2.5m plane parts to match and the provided space plane sizes are already more than enough for essential game play anything extra can and should be covered by modding. with the growing dissection over the extrended space plane revamp while leaving the old rocket parts to rot for the time being we really shouldn't encourage anything that would draw this out even longer.
Ok, I was inspired from this by the KAX parts I think, the ones with the 2.5m heavy aircraft.

Ok, I was inspired from this by the KAX parts I think, the ones with the 2.5m heavy aircraft.

Then use KAX if you have a preference for planes but stock doesn't need it. Maybe it's worth looking in the future if we get a 2.5m lf tank for nukes but even then I don't see people not groaning "not more planes what happened to kerbal SPACE program" really it doesn't seem worth the drama to me to try to make this official

Nope, but if we get 1.875 meter parts to fill the gap between 1.25 and 2.5 (it doesn't exist numericlly but visually and capabilities wise it totally does) then u would be fine with changing the new cockpit to that size
Yeah, that does make sense. And make it 2-person so it's more of a research jet or a C-17 or something like that.
